page.title: 03TRADE
page.content: When I studied the sphere of influence of the Lochans. I found that the area south of the village was beginning to take the shape of the crystaler{hypothesis}theory that all settlements should link up in a hexagonal. But, west of the village it is very hilly, the heighest point being 182 feet, so it is very sparcley populated and in my interviews I did not get any one from that area. I never interviewed anybody from the north of the village. I think because most of them will go to the major town in the area{STRANRAER. East of the village there are good roads to it but there also good roads to neighbouring village of{STONEYKIRK. Considering the reputation of the Lochans village, which is very unpopular, many will go to Stoneykirk.
